articles.description: Leeds United look set to hold talks with one of their key players over a new contract later this month as Jesse Marsch looks to prepare his squad for next term.
articles.content:
Leeds United will want to speak to Kalvin Phillips about a new contract later this month, according to journalist Pete O’Rourke.
Phillips is currently away on international duty, but O’Rourke does n… [+2185 chars]

articles.author: Keith Griffith
articles.title: Rangers fan, 29, is arrested for knocking out Lightning fan cold - Daily Mail
articles.description: James Anastasio, 29, was identified by authorities as the man seen in a viral video launching an unprovoked attack against a Lightning fan after Thursday's playoff game, which New York lost.
articles.content:
A New York Rangers fan has been arrested after sucker-punching a Tampa Bay Lightning supporter after Thursday's game at Madison Square Garden.
James Anastasio, 29, was identified by authorities as t… [+4932 chars]

articles.author: Spencer Morgan
articles.title: Antonio Conte 'wants to sign Lautaro Martinez from Inter Milan' as he eyes double raid on old club - Daily Mail
articles.description: Antonio Conte is reportedly interested in bringing Inter Milan forward Lautaro Martinez to Tottenham this summer. The Italian has already signed Ivan Perisic from his former club.
articles.content:
Antonio Conte is reportedly interested in bringing Inter Milan forward Lautaro Martinez to Tottenham this summer.
The Italian has already signed Ivan Perisic from his former club this summer.
